docs.title: Lab Equipment Booking
docs.text:
Welcome to the lab equipment booking system.

Browse our available equipment below — click on any item to view details and download files.

Cobalt Traffic Controller EVO Radar Flir TrafiSense AI Four-legged Robot Spot Husky A300 Mikado Soundcam Neousys NRU-220S Series Parrot ANAFI Ai Traction Plus Motion Simulator Platform Virtual Reality SlimX-13 Elara Radar Arduino MKR NB 1500 Jetson Orin Nano Super Developer Kit LPMS PVC cable noggin 250 Baumer VCXG.2-15C.I sensor HORUI SSD BI1brainterface eurorack ADDAC303 Muscle Sensing ADDAC307 Heart Sensing electromagnetic sensors Cable 4MS Pod64X Head Strap + QuickClip Raspberry Pi 4 Model B Geofón DIY kit Kinova Gen3 Zoom microphone

docs.title: Lab Space Overview
docs.text: Welcome to the EMRC Lab space overview. Below are interactive floor plans showing PC specs at each desk.

docs.title: 🏢 Floor 1 – Room 1
docs.text:
Room 1 has 4 desks. Desks 2 and 3 have PCs. Desk 1 and 4 are empty.

Desk 1 Desk 1

This desk is currently empty.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
Welcome to the EMRC Lab for Smart Mobility Management and Operation!

This lab focuses on advancing technologies for smart mobility through research and development. Below is an overview of our workflow and objectives:

docs.title: Objectives
docs.text:
1. Detect and Collect: Detect and collect data from various sources.
  2. Implement and Anticipate: Assess the impact of new autonomous technologies.
  3. Test and Act: Develop strategies based on performance evaluations.
